chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 is having an issue.
Delivery problem
Received nothing so far, although we were supposed to receive it on May 16th.
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer contacts us because DPD informs him that delivery is impossible, it is also marked on the tracking of the order. So, could you reach out to them to arrange for customer delivery please ?

Regards,
Marry from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have inquired our logistics partner about the situation. We will update you accordingly. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile,

Any news, please ?

Regards,
Marry from the Back Care Team.

Hello,
My iPhone 12 is having a problem as follows:
No delivery of my package yet
That's a scandal
It was supposed to arrive on the 16th and it's now the 22nd... That's a shame
Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the delivery instructions has been taken into account on 22/05. We are still checking with our logistics partner regarding the delay in delivery. We would update you when we receive a reply from them.

Regards,
SY

Hello,

My iPhone 12 is experiencing the following issue:

Hello,
We are May 24th and still no delivery
Will I receive it in December...??
I'm wondering.
Thank you for taking care of this otherwise, I'll request a refund
I am very unhappy.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

The customer should have received his package between May 15 and 16, but still nothing until today, so there is a delay of eight days in total.

Therefore, he asks for a commercial gesture of a shell protection for this inconvenience caused.

Regards,

Marry from the Back Care Team.

Dear Backcare,

We would like to offer a small commercial gesture to the customer for the inconvenience cause. May we ask how much the customer is willing to accept?

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile,

He wants to receive a protective case for his iPhone 12 64 GB.

Regards,

Marry from the Back Care Team.

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, ecomobile is unable to provide a protective case as a commercial gesture for the customer. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile,

So how much can you offer because the customer placed his order on 09/05 and received it only on 27/05, I hope it deserves compensation please.

Regards,
Marry from the Back Care Team.

Dear Backcare,

Could you kindly ask the customer how much he wishes to be compensated? Then I can contact my manager and see whether he is agreeable to it. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile,

The customer wishes a commercial gesture at an amount of €20.

Regards,
Marry from the Back Care Team.

Dear Backcare, 

Unfortunately, we are only able to provide the customer with a commercial gesture of 10 euros. Please check if the customer is agreeable to this.

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile,

The customer agrees, thank you for making the partial refund of €10.

Regards,
Marry from the Back Care Team.

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the commercial gesture, thank you for your assistance.

Regards,
YR
